PersonalOrgInfo.name: PersonalOrgInfo
PersonalOrgInfo.description: Represents the information for a Tableau Next personal org.

DeletedBy.description: The user ID that deleted the personal org.

DeletedDate.description: The date the personal org was deleted.

Description.description: The description for the personal org.

Details.description: The details for the personal org.

ErrorCode.description: The error code for the personal org.

IsPersonalOrgDeleted.description: Indicates whether the personal org is deleted (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the personal org was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the personal org was last viewed.

Name.description: The API name of the personal org.

OrgName.description: The name of the personal org.

PersonalOrg.description: The ID of the personal org.

PrimaryOrgUser.description: The email for the primary user of the personal org.

PrimaryOrgUserIdentifier.description: The user ID for the primary user of the personal org.

SignupCountry.description: The country of the personal org signup.

SignupEmail.description: The user email used for personal org signup.

SignupInstance.description: The Salesforce org instance used for personal org signup.

SignupLanguage.description: The language used for personal org setup.

SignupUsername.description: The user name used for personal org signup.

SourceType.description: The source of the personal org.

Status.description: The status of the personal org.
